title: Ticket #7568: Better messaging for DAGMan direct job submission
description:
In #6974 we introduced direct job submission into DAGMan. This allows is to send jobs directly to the condor_schedd without invoking condor_submit.

Our new implementation needs better messaging for errors, logging and general user interaction. Right now there's basically no messaging. Let's think about what would be useful and then add it in.
remarks:
2020-May-05 11:17:17 by coatsworth:
I've done a bunch of homework on this. It looks like our error messaging is pretty good when jobs succeed or fail outright. However the more subtle errors, for example a typo in attribute name, do not get reported by condor_dagman although they are very obvious when doing a regular condor_submit. I'm going to look into how we can pipe this information back into the dagman log, and I think that will be enough to resolve this ticket.
